name: Terry the Greedy Tomato
description:
Terry is a greedy tomato. Help him collect every coin.

This is a fixed camera platforming game. I had 6 weeks to complete this project. I unfortunately had some things in life come up about half way so the middle 3 weeks were not very usefull. 

I hope that you can get at least 15 minutes of enjoyment from this little game. I will be creating a new game over this next month. I'll be posting a devlog for this game and also a devlog for the next project when it comes out. 

Insta - leafmealonegamedev

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRPq0I6U3VqCsLs_OuWL9Gg
